text: Angraecum pyriforme is a species of plant in the family Orchidaceae. It is found in western tropical Africa, to be precise in Cameroon, Ivory Coast, and Nigeria. Its natural habitat is subtropical or tropical moist montane forests. It is threatened by habitat loss. == References == Category:Vulnerable plants pyriforme Category:Orchids of Cameroon Category:Orchids of Nigeria Category:Flora of Ivory Coast Category:Taxonomy articles created by Polbot
title: Angraecum pyriforme
